attributes.action: Introduce specific legislation to govern Debt Collection Agencies, conduct and methods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Various Debt Collection Agencies, ignore the Office of Fair Trading Guidelines. They demonstrate little concern in relation to the Information Commissioners Office or Trading Standards. Legislation needs to be introduced to regulate the conduct of these companies. This legislation, would need to clarify the rights and duties of Debt Collection Agencies and the ownership of debts, to prevent consumer confusion

The introduction of the CCA 2006, needs to be strenghted to in relation to Debt Collection Agencies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
